ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD cracks The Da Vinci Code, freaks out X-Men: The Last Stand and sings a simple American Idol song! MAD also spoofs Deal or No Deal, prom themes, the Anna Nicole Smith Supreme Court case and much more. Plus, Spy vs. Spy!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:08:37. [Issue ID 129300]
